Reviews.Title: Well made and powerful phone
Reviews.Author: Dino Flores
Reviews.Content: While most people are looking at Samsung or Apple, Huawei in my opinion has taken the lead in the space of phablets. This phone is incredibly well made and very very fast and can easily be operated with one hand.The earphones do not fit my ears touch nor will they fit anybody else. But again the phone is superb

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: julie
Reviews.Content: Very elegant looking phone. Well made and sturdy. Especially nice in white colour.  Not as heavy in hand as people might think.

Reviews.Title: Like it.
Reviews.Author: Farryn
Reviews.Content: I like the phone but it started getting slow pretty shortly after I got it. Kind of a bummer deal.

Reviews.Title: Buy it!
Reviews.Author: Hilton madevu
Reviews.Content: So far so good :)My Huawei AM is meeting the planned role as a cross between a tablet and mobile phone at half the price (compared to Samsung Galaxy Mega for example).The system has crashed once but it saved my last activities and restarted where I left off.It is tough to find any accessories for this device except online and the options are limited.It's obviously not ideal for people with small hands and/or pockets but perfect for me.No surprises in the buying and delivery process either. It was delivered ahead of time & in expected order.In a nutshell, I highly recommend this buy.

Reviews.Title: Big
Reviews.Author: John Profanchik
Reviews.Content: If you have never held a big white one in your hand, well ladies this is the phone for you.
